content.text: Hi! What's something you're passionate about?
I'm passionate about music and photography!
That's awesome! What kind of music do you like?
I like all sorts of music, but I'm really into indie rock and folk music.
I love indie rock! What are some of your favorite bands?
I love The Shins, The Decemberists, and The Mountain Goats.
Those are all great bands! I love The Shins and The Mountain Goats.
Me too! They're both so talented.
What about photography? What kind of photography do you like to do?
I like to do landscape photography and portrait photography.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to get into photography, but I'm not very good at it.
It's a lot of fun! You should definitely give it a try.
I think I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about photography.
